contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
PETITION GRANTED, Limited to Question I only and is to be consolidated with Commonwealth v. Lisboy 153 E.D. Appeal Docket 1990.
AND NOW, this 6th day of August, 1991, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is granted, No. 118 E.D. Appeal Docket 1991, limited to the issue in Commonwealth v. Lisboy, No. 153 E.D. Appeal Docket 1990, and is consolidated therewith.
